LanguageData.BuildPlasmaPistol.label: Build C1 Ascension
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaPrecision.label: Build C2 Moonspell
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaPrecision.description: A plasma sniper rifle, highly accurate but with a low rate of fire.
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaCarbine.label: Build C3 Conjurer
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaCarbine.description: A short range, lightweight plasma rifle.
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaShotgun.label: Build C5 Incantator
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaShotgun.description: Very rare plasma shotgun. Deals high damage at short range; less effective at long range. Effective against armor, shields and biotic barriers. It is of human design but is only used by krogan, due to the fact that the kickback from a single shot has enough force to break a human's arm. Protected by Fabrication Rights Management (FRM) technology, this weapon is nearly impossible to reproduce and is prohibitively expensive.
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaRifle.label: Build C7 StormWizard
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaRifle.description: Builds the Multi-Plasma Blaster, with good stopping power and range.
